thumb.title: Finding the unicorn on you podcast guest. Richard Blank Costa Rica's Call Center.
thumb.description: Finding the Unicorn in You Podcast #88: Unicorn Round Up with Richard Blank, Julie Seibert Coraccio and Sara DeaconOn a recent Finding the Unicorn in You podcast, host Dr. Jaime Raygoza gathered a panel of experts to unpack the complex dynamics of workplace gossip. With insights from publishing consultant Julie Coraccio, adulting coach Sara Deacon, and call center CEO Richard Blank, this unicorn roundup explores gossip's roots, risks, and strategies to redirect its power.Richard’s journey in the call center space is filled with twists and turns. When he was 27 years old, he relocated to Costa Rica to train employees for one of the larger call centers in San Jose. https://youtu.be/sInHt3Yag8Ehttps://youtu.be/-RJYvbP1Xv4
